body:
## Summary

The `lru` Rust crate dependency in `temporalio/bridge/Cargo.lock` is currently at version **0.16.0**, which is affected by a soundness vulnerability.

## Vulnerability Details

- **Advisory:** [GHSA-rhfx-m35p-ff5j](https://github.com/advisories/ghsa-rhfx-m35p-ff5j)
- **Severity:** Low (CVSS 2.7/10)
- **Affected versions:** 0.9.0 â€“ 0.16.2
- **Patched version:** 0.16.3

**Issue:** The `IterMut` iterator's `next` and `next_back` methods temporarily create an exclusive reference to the key when dereferencing the internal node pointer, violating Rust's Stacked Borrows rules.

## Requested Action

Please update the `lru` dependency to version 0.16.3 or later in the Rust bridge's Cargo.lock to resolve this advisory.

## Environment

- temporalio version: 1.21.1
- Current lru version in Cargo.lock: 0.16.0
title: Security: Update lru Rust dependency to 0.16.3 (GHSA-rhfx-m35p-ff5j)
